Html:

event

It looks like a problem with the certificate, but I have checked it and the certificate is installed correctly in the client, and its the same certificate which one I signed the Update.
Where can be the problem??? I am getting crazy!

Thanks in advanced

Effectively
2013-09-30 13:51:05:166 1612 318 Misc WARNING: Digital Signatures on file C:\WINDOWS\SoftwareDistribution\Download\c4e88efea154b061b329676e5348dbf4\63e96adf-995a-49ba-bac6-73a798fddd31_1.cab are not trusted: Error 0x800b0109
Please review these posts :
Updates on Client computer fail with Error Code 800B0109
Error Code 800B0109 When Installing Adobe Reader

Thanks!!
It was a proble with the certificate. It was missing in one of the places.

regards!
